item.title: Apprentice Socialite (Level 3)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Author (Level 4)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Stone Mason (Level 4)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 2)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 3)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Collector (Level 1)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Product Manager (Level 1)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 1)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 14 times with git add -p.

item.title: Apprentice Banker (Level 2)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Apprentice Socialite (Level 2)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Historian (Level 4)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 1)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Master Locksmith (Level -inf)
item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.

item.title: Apprentice News Reader (Level 1)
item.description: Show logs with difference each commit introduces with git whatchanged

item.title: Librarian
item.description: Looked for change that introduce or remove a string with git log -S

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 1)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Homeowner
item.description: Set global email address using git config.

item.title: Apprentice Goldsmith (Level 1)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Apprentice Historian (Level 3)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Fisherman (Level 1)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.
